raw_comment: I noticed that the number of younger people who are from various countries are higher than the optimism from older people. However, there are outlier countries such as Indonesia and India. I wonder about the future leaders of America, if younger generation has higher hopes for the future of the world how will programs to decrease global warming and other issues such as preservation of habitats will have greater momentum because of the hope of younger generation is greater. This relates to my community because I am surrounded by future leaders, the more he have hope for the future the more we will be motivated to change it for the better. A catchy headline for this graph would be, "The Hope of Humanity Lies With the Young".
ace_sentences: I noticed a difference between younger people and older people.
Younger people from many countries are more optimistic than older people.
I wonder about the future leaders of America.
The younger generation may have higher hopes for the future of the world.
Programs to decrease global warming exist.
If the younger generation has higher hopes, then the programs to decrease global warming will have greater momentum.
If the younger generation has higher hopes, then the programs to preserve habitats will have greater momentum.
I am surrounded by future leaders.
If future leaders have more hope for the future, then we will be more motivated to change the world for the better.
The headline is: The hope of humanity lies with the young.
